alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Niobrara and east central Converse Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 532 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Bill to near Douglas to 9 miles north of Esterbrook. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Keeline, Lance Creek, Manning Ranch and Lost Springs. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 127 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
